bulletPoints: Full stack software developer with experience in designing, deploying, and maintaining web applications.
Proven ability to deliver reliable solutions on schedule by collaborating across teams and optimizing for performance and user experience.
A curious learner who is constantly improving through hands-on projects.
Embrace challenges as opportunities for discoveries.
app.personalSummary: I’m a full stack software developer who loves turning ideas into web applications that just work. I thrive on collaborating with teams to deliver reliable, high-performance solutions that users enjoy. Curious by nature, I’m always learning and experimenting through hands-on projects, and I see every challenge as a chance to discover something new.
